C

Checker - Class in <Unnamed>
implements all methods and functions defined in CheckerInterface
Checker(String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class Checker
Constructor for Checker object sets the color of the checker sets the coordinates of the checker makes the checker a king if it is a king
CheckerInPath(Checker, Checker[], String[][], String) - Method in class Checker
Checks if there is a Checker in the path of movement of the current checker if so return location of that checker
CheckerInPath(Checker, Checker[], String[][], String) - Method in interface CheckerInterface
This method checks if there is a checker piece in the path of the selected checker piece to be moved.
CheckerInPath2(Checker, Checker[], String[][], String, String) - Method in class Checker
This method figures out what two checkers were behind the checker when it jumped.
CheckerInPath2(Checker, Checker[], String[][], String, String) - Method in interface CheckerInterface
This method is similar to CheckerInPath(), but the difference in this method is that this method discovers which two checkers were previously in the path of the checker before it jumped.
CheckerInterface - Interface in <Unnamed>
Interface defining all Checker methods and functions some of which are unimplemented and will be implemented as future milestones are reached
Checkers - Variable in class MainGUI
private array that will contain all the checker pieces that are currently on the board
Checkers2 - Variable in class MainGUI
Holds instance of Checker
checkSave() - Method in class MainGUI
Checks if a saved file exists, and if there is no directory associated with it.
classBinaryTree - Class in <Unnamed>
 
classBinaryTree() - Constructor for class classBinaryTree
 
clearBoard() - Method in class MainGUI
Looks at all the checker pieces and sets each button to have no icon
color - Variable in class Checker
Stores the color of the checker object on the board.
color - Variable in class Node
 
Comp - Variable in class MainGUI
 
Coord - Variable in class Checker
Stores the current location of the checker on the board.
Coord - Variable in class MainGUI
 
coord - Variable in class Node
 
coordinates - Variable in class MainGUI
Contains Coordinates for every tile and is used to set it up in a grid layout to resemble a checkers game board
Coordinates - Variable in class Node
 
coordinates2 - Variable in class MainGUI
 
counter - Variable in class MainGUI
private counter value for game pieces on the board starting at 0
counter - Variable in class Node
 
counter2 - Variable in class MainGUI
Used as a counter to check how many times a user has clicked on the board.
counter2 - Variable in class Node
 
counter3 - Variable in class MainGUI
Used as a counter to check how many times a user has clicked on the board.
customGame() - Method in class MainGUI
When the custom game option is selected, (when prompted by the Custom Game button) this function takes the custom setup that was previously received from user input and stored as an array (tiles), and sets the respective buttons to be enabled.
